mapper.select: select id, article_id, article_name, article_author, article_introduct, article_time, article_content, article_corpus_id from zyjblog.t_article where id = #{id}
select id, article_id, article_name, article_author, article_introduct, article_time, article_content, article_corpus_id from zyjblog.t_article limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into zyjblog.t_article(article_id, article_name, article_author, article_introduct, article_time, article_content, article_corpus_id, article_state) values (#{articleId}, #{articleName}, #{articleAuthor}, #{articleIntroduct}, #{articleTime}, #{articleContent}, #{articleCorpusId}, #{articleState})
mapper.update:
update zyjblog.t_article
article_id = #{articleId},
article_name = #{articleName},
article_author = #{articleAuthor},
article_introduct = #{articleIntroduct},
article_time = #{articleTime},
article_content = #{articleContent},
article_corpus_id = #{articleCorpusId},
where id = #{id}
